name: Farmyard Frenzy (Allerises)
description:
Hey there, I'm your uncle Mike! You were so little the last time we met, I doubt you even remember me...

Oh, well that's alright. We'll have plenty of time for re-introductions after you've rounded up the livestock and put them in their pens.

Be quick. There's wolves about and they'll devour any animal they find!

(Note: best played on desktop with controller.)

Entry for Scorespace Jam 13, Theme: Dodge.

Game developed solo.

Royalty Free Assets:

Chicken, Sacred Cow, Cowboy Hat, Farmer, Grass, Night Mode, Pig, Sheep, Sun, Tree, Wolf Icons made by Freepik from www.flaticon.com.

Rooster icon: https://www.iconfinder.com/icons/7830707/rooster_icon.

Animal, cow, lunar, newyear, ox icon: https://www.iconfinder.com/icons/5650718/animal_cow_lunar_newyear_ox_icon.

Barn clipart PNG Designed By yangyang from Pngtree.com.
